name: Adpard Affiliate Network
overview:
Welcome to Adpard Affiliate Network!

As a leading performance-based (CPA) network, Adpard goes beyond your expectations and keeps a close working relationship with Advertisers and Affiliates to ensure that every objective is achieved successfully. Adpardâ€™s most important objective is to provide its clients with excellent customer service, accurate tracking system, exclusive offers at highest payouts, and timely publisher payments. We want our affiliates to experience the positive success rate that Adpard has to offer, that is why we work on various techniques and proven partnership strategy. We strongly believe that the success of our clients is parallel to the accomplishment of Adpard affiliate network. It does not matter if your affiliate career is in its early stages or you are someone who is considered an expert marketer, Adpard works on a tight business ethics with our advertisers and affiliates to achieve exceptional accomplishment.
